attributes.action: ask the BBC Director General to show the DEC humanitarian appeal for Gaza
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned, petition the Prime Minister Gordon Brown MP, to formally call upon the BBC Director General to allow the DEC humanitarian appeal for Gaza to be shown on the BBC; and add further that Sky should follow suit, alike broadcasters ITV, Channel 4 and Five, and the Prime Minister's own No. 10 website. We also call for the Prime Minister to ask the Culture, Media and Sport Select Committee to bring the BBC Trust to Parliament, to explain their Director General's unfair, harmful and irrational decision to Parliamentarians.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
